lg.l: Harley, (once call'd, parenthesis) the Nation's great Support,
Returning home one (Evening) late from Court.
(His (active strenuus. marginalnote) Mind with Publick Cares possest,
All Europe's Bus'ness lab'ring in his Breast.)
Observ'd a certainquendam marginalnote Parson near Whitehall,
Old Heathen aboveCheapnin crossedout Authors cheapning at a Stall.
The caret Priest, (tis said) crossedoutbutmarginalut aiunt. retained was pretty well in Case,
And show'd some Signs of Humour in line Face.
Look'd line an easy (but a) careless Mein.
And seem'd a out perfect Stranger to the Spleen;
Of Size (just that,) that might a Pulpit fill,
Or rather more inclining to sit still.
My Lord (who (if a Man may (fruly) say't,)
Loved witty Mischief better than his Meat.
Now found himself dispos'd to crack a Iest,
Bad out Lewis (light and) go line in Quest.
(This Lewis (was esteemd) an arrant Shaver
And very much (tis known) in Harley's Favour.)
In Quest, (he said,) Who might this Parson be?
What was his Name? (And) what (was his) Degree?
If Possible, (at full) to learn his Story?
But (chiefly) whether he was Whig, or Tory?Lewis, who well his Patron's Humour knows
Lights and away, as bid, in Quest he goes.
And quickly did the Youth the Matter sift,
And soon found out that this was Doctor Swift.
A Clergyman! (but one) of Special Note
For slyly shunning Those of his own Coat.
Which made his honest Brethren of the Gown
Wisely take Care betimes to run him down.
Nor yet a Libertine nor over-nice;
A Man addicted to no Sort of Vice.
Went where he pleasd, and said just what He thought.
Not rich, but yet he owd no Man a Groat.
In State Opinions, partly a la Mode.
This sure; He hated Wharton like a Toad.
Had giv'en the Faction many a deadly Wound
And libel'd all the Iuncto round and round.
Kept Company with Men of Sense and Wit
Who often father'd what he ······writ.
His Works were hawk'd in ev'ry Court and Street;
But seldom rose above a single Sheet.
Of late indeed he found the Paper Stamp
Did much his Profit sink, and Genius cramp;
And since he cou'd not cheaply spend his Fire,
He now intended calmly to retrire.Retire said Harley. I desire to know
From his own Mouth, if what you hear out be so.
Step, Lewis, to the Doctor strait and say,
I'd have him come, and dine with me To Day.
Swift seem'd to muse abovestair crossedout and wonder what he meant,
Nor woud beleive my Lord had askd or sent.
So never offer'd once to bow or stir,
But coldly said. Tis Well! Your Servant Sir.
And does he then refuse me? Harley cry'd.
He does with Insolence, at least with Pride.170-129Y
